tool_description: Performs mathematical verification of invoice calculations including line item extensions, subtotals, tax calculations, and final totals to ensure arithmetic accuracy.

line_item_unit_prices.description: Unit prices for each line item

line_item_totals.description: Extended totals as stated for each line item

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount before taxes and discounts

precision_decimals.description: Number of decimal places for rounding (0-4)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: Quantities, unit prices, and line totals arrays must have same length. Check data extraction consistency.
Invalid precision: Decimal precision must be between 0-4 places. Use 2 for currency calculations.
Negative values detected: Quantities and prices should be positive unless specifically for returns. Verify sign conventions.
Zero division error: Unit prices cannot be zero for extension calculations. Check pricing data.
Calculation overflow: Numbers too large for calculation. Check for data extraction errors.
usage: Provide arrays of quantities, unit prices, and line totals, plus subtotal, tax, and total amounts. Optionally specify discount and precision. Returns verification of all calculations.

calculations_valid.description: Whether all calculations are mathematically correct

line_item_errors.description: Number of line items with calculation errors

subtotal_variance.description: Difference between calculated and stated subtotal

total_variance.description: Difference between calculated and stated total

error_details.description: Detailed list of calculation errors found
